metadata.title: CVE-2021-3402 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An integer overflow and several buffer overflow reads in libyara/modules/macho/macho.c in YARA v4.0.3 and earlier could allow an attacker to either cause denial of service or information disclosure via a malicious Mach-O file. Affects all versions before libyara 4.0.4

criterions.comment: yara package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
